name: SuperWave
description:
Made in 72hrs for the GDL Quantum Jam.

A shooter where the bullets exhibit wavelike qualities. 

Avoid the waves and ride on the interference patterns. 

Use the mouse to navigate, left click to shoot.

(Secret ability - right click for another type of "bullet"!)

There are 4 levels in total. Play in full screen for the best experience.

Music by Lee Rosevere - User Friendly Future Mix
